EmailTemplate.name: 201911_BK_Webinar_AeroFlight-SocialFlight_amr.4.In Case You Missed It - BK
EmailTemplate.subject: ICYMI: Our "Ditch the Pump" webinar is on-demand
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Use access code 908505 to watch now. Steven Pearce, avid pilot and Product Marketing Manager for BendixKing, along with SocialFlight President, Jeff Simon, an A&P/IA mechanic, discussed how to “Ditch the Pump”: regulations pertaining to electronic attitude indicators and vacuum system removal, as well as the AeroFlight KI 300 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]>.
Topics included:
- The Evolution of Attitude Systems - PFDs vs AIs - The regulations of replacement - Avoiding pitfalls during your conversion - AeroFlight KI 300
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner. WATCH NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/ditch-the-pump.html]]>
